      • getConnectorConfig

        public static TWConnectorConfig getConnectorConfig()
        Gets the connector configuration object.
        Returns:
        connector configuration

      • runGrabData

        private static void runGrabData()
        Read data from the historical log queue and sends to payload manager. If memory is low, show a warning and skip reading data.

      • loadConfiguration

        private static void loadConfiguration()
        Detects the provisioning mode and reads the configuration appropriately from file.

      • configLogger

        private static void configLogger()
        Configures the logger to the logging level specified in the configuration.

      • setHttpTimeouts

        private static void setHttpTimeouts()
        Sets the http timeouts. Note: This changes the eWON's global HTTP timeouts and stores these values in NV memory.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method for the Ewon Flexy Thingworx Connector. This is the primary application entry point, and will run the Thingworx Connector application.
        Parameters:
        args - program arguments (ignored)
